userStories.title: US-7.1.1 Email Login
userStories.description: As a user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account.
userStories.acceptanceCriteria:
- User can enter email and password
- System validates credentials
- User is redirected to dashboard on success
- Error message shown on invalid credentials

userStories.title: US-7.1.2 Password Reset
userStories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it.
userStories.acceptanceCriteria:
- User can request a password reset via email
- Reset link expires after 24 hours
- New password must meet complexity requirements
